byline.contributor: Matt Stroud reported from Pittsburgh, and Christine Hauser from New York. Eli Rosenberg contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MATT STROUD and CHRISTINE HAUSER

abstract: Allegheny County, Pa, Dist Atty Stephen A Zappala Jr says shooting at backyard party in Wilkinsburg that left five people dead and three wounded was premeditated and calculated, and that two gunmen were involved.
lead_paragraph: The police said they were looking for two gunmen who attacked a party in Wilkinsburg, Pa. In addition to the dead, three people were wounded.

headline.main: Shooting That Killed 5 at Party Near Pittsburgh Was Planned, Police Say
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Mid-Atlantic; Pennsylvania: Mass Shooting Called Calculated

snippet: The police said they were looking for two gunmen who attacked a party in Wilkinsburg, Pa. In addition to the dead, three people were wounded.
